Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class LoadingController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.LoadingController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class LoadingController extends Object implements GUIController
The LoadingController class implements the GUIController interface and controls the loading scene of the game.

    • PlayerNumberChosen

      public void PlayerNumberChosen()
      Handles the event when the player number is chosen. Determines the selected player number and notifies the GUI manager.
